title: Request HOA Documents
description: A property under contract is in a Homeowners Association (HOA). The TC needs to order the HOA resale package.

tasks.description: Find the contact information for the property's HOA management company.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the HOA company name and contact details from the MLS listing or seller disclosures.

tasks.description: Contact the HOA company to order the resale package and pay the associated fee.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully places an order for the required documents.

tasks.description: Track the delivery of the HOA documents and ensure they are delivered to the buyer within the contractual timeframe.
tasks.expected_outcome: The TC sets a reminder for the document delivery and follows up if they are not received on time.
